sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Bikeway Act.

sections.heading: Legislative declarations and findings.
sections.text:
The General Assembly
declares
that since a third of the population owns
bicycles, there is an urgent need for safe bikeways, for the use of both
children and adults for transportation, healthy exercise and recreation.

sections.heading: Responsible agency; bikeways program; use of funds.
sections.text: Responsible agency; bikeways program; use of funds.

sections.heading: The annual appropriation to the Department for purposes of this Act
sections.text:
shall include funds for the development of bicycle paths and a State-wide
bikeways program in this State. In addition, the Department may accept and
expend federal funds granted for bikeway purposes.

sections.heading: In expending funds available for purposes of this Act, the
sections.text:
Department
shall cooperate with municipalities, townships, counties, road
districts, park districts and other appropriate agencies and
organizations and, where possible and practicable, shall allocate its
expenditures among the several regions of the State, proportionally to
the bicycling population.
